text: San Luis Pass is a strait of water at the south-western end of Galveston Island off the shores of the U.S. state of Texas. It connects the sheltered waters of West Bay to the open Gulf of Mexico. There are also two mountain passes of the same name in the USA: *San Luis Pass, Colorado skirting the San Luis Peak in the San Juan Mountains *San Luis Pass, New Mexico ==Other websites== * San Luis Pass Fishing Pier * A Sedimentologic Description of a Microtidal, Flood-Tidal Delta, San Luis Pass, Texas Category:Geography of Texas Category:Bodies of water of the United States
title: San Luis Pass
